original_text: The second angel poured out his bowl into the sea, and it became like the blood of a corpse, and every living thing died that was in the sea.
korean_text: 둘째 천사가 그 대접을 바다에 쏟으매 바다가 곧 죽은 자의 피 같이 되니 바다 가운데 모든 생물이 죽더라

sentences.original_text: The second angel poured out his bowl into the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 천사가 그 대접을 바다에 쏟아부었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it became like the blood of a corpse
